title: Looking for people to play
body:
Hello, I am looking for people to play with in ranked/normals/ranked 5s. I'm a bit rusty as I took a break from the game however, as exams and the semester is almost over, I'll be able to play a lot of games. Anyone interested in queuing up for games add my IGN: L33t King.

Kind regards.

replies.body: Hey, im down to play. I have just been playing kinda casual for a bit as I stopped playing before and am keen to get into it a lot again.
